title: #54 The Priest and The Crutches *BONUS PATREON EPISODE*
itunes:title: #54 The Priest and The Crutches *BONUS PATREON EPISODE*
itunes:subtitle: A Full Patreon Episode of Tiny Tales
description:
https://www.reallifeghoststoriespodcast.com


This week, we are not releasing a new episode! This is because Dan is away and Emma is about to submit her thesis. Instead of leaving you all waiting for a week, we are releasing one of our Patreon Episodes to the public!

If you ever wondered what our weekly Patreon episodes are like, now is your chance to hear one - for $5 a month you get access to a back catalogue of 25 Tiny Tales Episodes and a new one weekly!


Why not support us on Patreon: 

www.patreon.com/reallifeghoststories

 

All stories from boards.ie


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
